settings.text: Brand Ambassador Kayla from @reynoldsresidence shares her morning routines and how she sets her day up for success.

I must admit, I, like many others struggle in January. The dark mornings and long nights seem relentless, and I find myself longing for the first signs of Spring. One of the things I said I would prioritise this year is to make more time for me by slowing down, and starting the day with a good routine. Energise your environment I’m a massive believer that your environment has a huge impact on your mindset, so I started the year with some new bedding.

settings.title: Dress your bed
settings.text:
I’m guilty of waking up and starting work straight away – which can sometimes mean I don’t make the bed every day – or at least not first thing in the morning (come on, we all do it!). But I am making the time to dress the bed everyday before I do anything else, so the room feels refreshed, less cluttered and ready for the day.

And if nothing else happens that day, at least I have accomplished making the bed! Crisp sheets, a throw and a few cushions give an effortless yet staged look.
